column5: A delightful bedroom, twin bed, designer bedding, private ensuite 3 pc bath, TV in room, personal beverage center stocked for Keurig, private refrigerator, an additional roll-away bed available  Access to the outdoor space with pool & deck Home is in the historic district just walking distance to the downtown square  McKinney is known for having a vibrant downtown area and If itâ€™s any testament to the town, Money Magazine rated McKinney #1 place to live!
